content: Project setup: Create backend directory structure with Node.js + Express + TypeScript configuration
Project setup: Create frontend directory structure with React + Vite + TypeScript configuration
Database setup: Configure Prisma ORM with PostgreSQL schema for User and Family models
Authentication system: Implement Passport.js + JWT authentication with registration and login endpoints
Backend API: Implement Family CRUD operations with proper validation and error handling
Frontend auth UI: Create login/register pages with React Router and form handling
Frontend family management: Create family dashboard and management interface
Testing implementation: Add comprehensive backend tests (Jest + Supertest)
Testing implementation: Add frontend tests (Vitest + React Testing Library)
Docker setup: Create Docker Compose configuration for development environment
CI/CD setup: Create GitHub Actions pipeline for automated testing
